description: A short documentary follows the Op-Ed columnist Nicholas D. Kristof as he travels across the country talking to ordinary citizens about their lives and the effectiveness of American sanctions.
title: My Iranian Road Trip
title_page: My Iranian Road Trip - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Nicholas Kristof, an Op-Ed columnist and winner of two Pulitzer Prizes, brings attention to human rights abuses and social injustices around the world. Read his columns.
